message.entry: The ''v6'' argument to COLORBAR is deprecated, and will no longer be supported in a future release.
The colorbar handle must be followed by either ''delete'', ''hide'' or ''off''.
Unrecognized input or invalid parameter/value pair arguments.
''Parent'' must be followed by a scalar graphics handle.
A Colorbar can not be a child of an object of type {0}.
Property names must be character vectors
''peer'' must be followed by an axes handle.
The colorbar handle must be followed by either ''delete'', ''hide'' or ''off''.
Labels cannot be on the {0} of a {1} colorbar.
A colorbar and its associated axes must have the same parent.
A colorbar must be copied with its associated axes. Use a vector input with COPYOBJ in order to copy the colorbar and axes together.
